live_updates: Work to restore services in the area continues. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40847.summary: Some customers in Dawson Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40847.title: Aug 18 – Dawson Creek | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
